posts.post_content:
Currently I am running Marquard’s card on eBay for $259 (vintagetobacco). I will sell here for $225, with free shipping.  PayPal family and friends is great, but I would also accept straight PayPal. I am disappointed in paying high eBay fees.

(Sorry, but Eddie sold!)

[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20220120/f2f61ae1a8568c4729a4840e0c2211be.jpg[/IMG]

A question on Eddie’s rating. His card has not been trimmed. In fact, it may be slightly larger than normal. Therefore, I assume the “A” grade is for the miscut, losing his name. Did they not, in the past, grade cards independent of a miscut, and mark the cards also as miscut. I ask because I love this Collins card in its presentation, and I think the “A” grading is misleading.
Thanks for looking,
Jeff[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20220120/39b5edc9c831cd2daf0463422f68dcb8.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20220120/8b3ea13c1bafe04804a7699b72559402.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20220120/b97d00a1c87a3dd87acd18e8042536d1.jpg[/IMG]


Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk
